CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 19, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Harvest Scene - Youth had its chance to display its talents in the big Parent-Teacher Talent and Fashion Show at A. Leo Weil School last week. Left to right: Constance Boyd, Anna Mae Murphy, Beatrice Gilbert, Robert Black, Joyce Blake and Robert Richardson. Whether it was doing the hula or modeling the latest in Junior Miss styles, the Parent-Teacher Association's Fashion Show scored a big his with the large audience. - Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Constance Boyd, Anna Mae Murphy and Beatrice Gilbert in hula skirts and leis, and Robert Black, Joyce Blake and Robert Richardson in overalls, posed on stage in A. Leo Weil School for Parent - Teacher Talent and Fashion Show
